Package org.relationlearn.filters

Provides facilities to create text filters and generate weka compatible Instance objects with them.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FilterGroup
    The FilterGroup interface defines a container for an undefined amount of TextFilters allowing the generation of weka Instance objects with as many attributes as the number of TextFilter objects present in the group.
    TextFilter
    The TextFilter interface represents an object capable of obtaining a certain information from a pair of text Strings and map them to a given Attribute to be used when creating Instance objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonWordsFilter
    An implementation of TextFilter which returns the ratio of words that appear in both texts compared to the total number of different words found in both texts.
    PunctuationCounterFilter
    An implementation of TextFilter which counts the amount of '!'
    SequentialFilterGroup
    Implementation of FilterGroup which applies the TextFilter objects to the input in the same order they were added to group and in a sequential manner.
    WordOcurrenceFilter
    An implementation of TextFilter which returns the ratio of words that have been found of the total amount of words specified in a given word list.
    WordRatioFilter
    An implementation of TextFilter which returns the division between the number of words in the hypothesis text and the response text.
    WordSearchFilter
    An implementation of TextFilter which checks if the text given contains a certain word or not.

Package org.relationlearn.filters Description

Provides facilities to create text filters and generate weka compatible Instance objects with them.
